# Low Dimensional Projection of Cytometry Samples

[![Project Status: Active – The project has reached a stable, usable
state and is being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)
[![R-CMD-check-bioc](https://github.com/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoMDS/workflows/R-CMD-check-bioc/badge.svg)](https://github.com/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoMDS/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check-bioc)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPL3.0-blue)](https://opensource.org/licenses/GPL-3.0)
[![codecov.io](https://codecov.io/github/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoMDS/coverage.svg?branch=main)](https://codecov.io/github/UCLouvain-CBIO/CytoMDS?branch=main)

The `CytoMDS` package implements a low dimensional visualization of a
set of cytometry samples, in order to visually assess the ‘distances’
between them. This, in turn, can greatly help the user to identify
quality issues like batch effects or outlier samples, and/or check the
presence of potential sample clusters that might align with the
experimental design.

The `CytoMDS` algorithm combines, on the one hand, the concept of Earth
Mover’s Distance (EMD), a.k.a. Wasserstein metric and, on the other
hand, the Multi Dimensional Scaling (MDS) algorithm for the low
dimensional projection.

Also, the package provides some diagnostic tools for both checking the
quality of the MDS projection, as well as tools to help with the
interpretation of the axes of the projection.

### License

The `CytoMDS` code is provided under [GPL license version 3.0 or
higher](https://opensource.org/licenses/GPL-3.0). The documentation,
including the manual pages and the vignettes, are distributed under a
[CC BY-SA 4.0 license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/).

### Citation

If you use `CytoMDS` in your research, please use the following
citation:

> Hauchamps, Philippe, Simon Delandre, Stephane T. Temmerman, Dan Lin,
> and Laurent Gatto. 2024. “Visual quality control with CytoMDS, a
> Bioconductor package for low dimensional representation of cytometry
> sample distances.” *Cytometry A*, *107*(3), 177-186.

or run `citation("CytoMDS")` to get the bibtex entry.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`show(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`DistSum(`*`<matrix>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`DistSum(`*`<list>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`dim(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`dimnames(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `dimnames<-`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`,`*`<list>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `dimnames<-`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`ncol(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`colnames(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `colnames<-`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`nrow(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`rownames(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `rownames<-`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`nFeatures()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`featureNames(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `featureNames<-`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<missing>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<missing>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`` `[`( ``*`<DistSum>`*`,`*`<ANY>`*`,`*`<missing>`*`,`*`<missing>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`as.matrix(`*`<DistSum>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  [`distByFeature()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/DistSum-class.md)
  : DistSum class
- [`EMDDist()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/EMDDist.md)
  : Calculate Earth Mover's distance between two samples
- [`show(`*`<MDS>`*`)`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`nDim()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`nPoints()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`pwDist()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`projections()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`projDist()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`stress()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`spp()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`eigenVals()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`pctvar()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`RSq()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`RSqVec()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`GoF()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  [`smacofRes()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/MDS.md)
  : MDS class
- [`channelSummaryStats()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/channelSummaryStats.md)
  : Summary statistics per channel computation
- [`computeMetricMDS()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/computeMetricMDS.md)
  : metric MDS projection of sample
- [`ggplotDistFeatureImportance()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/ggplotDistFeatureImportance.md)
  : Plot of feature relative importance in distance
- [`ggplotMarginalDensities()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/ggplotMarginalDensities.md)
  : Plot of channel intensity marginal densities
- [`ggplotSampleMDS()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/ggplotSampleMDS.md)
  : Plot of Metric MDS object
- [`ggplotSampleMDSShepard()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/ggplotSampleMDSShepard.md)
  : Plot of Metric MDS object - Shepard diagram
- [`ggplotSampleMDSWrapBiplots()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/ggplotSampleMDSWrapBiplots.md)
  : SampleMDS biplot wrapping
- [`ggplotVolcano()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/ggplotVolcano.md)
  : standard volcano plot
- [`pairwiseEMDDist()`](https://uclouvain-cbio.github.io/CytoMDS/reference/pairwiseEMDDist.md)
  : Pairwise Earth Mover's Distance calculation
